com.appsdk.advancedimageview

Class AdvancedImageCarousel

  • java.lang.Object
    • RelativeLayout
      • com.appsdk.advancedimageview.AdvancedImageCarousel

  • public class AdvancedImageCarousel
extends RelativeLayout
    AdvancedImageCarousel is a widget can automatic scroll images. It takes bitmap cache management, add individual floating layer in bottom, and can set many attributes to display as you want. For example aspect ratio, default image, loading image, error image, dot image etc.
